B2 in a way that relates to money or how money is managed: financially viable The project is not financially viable (= will not produce enough money).financially dependent on He's still financially dependent on (= regularly receives money to live from) his parents. Financially, we're doing well. See
financial
More examplesFewer examplesFinancially, this year has been one of the best years for the festival.The district continues to struggle financially.They have been financially destroyed by losing their entire pension.
